name: EverQuote, Inc.
description: EverQuote, Inc. is an online insurance marketplace that connects consumers with insurance providers. Founded in 2011 and headquartered in Cambridge, Massachusetts, EverQuote's mission is to make insurance shopping easier and more transparent. The company operates a digital platform that allows users to compare quotes from various insurance carriers across a range of insurance products, including auto, home, health, and life insurance. By leveraging advanced technology and data analytics, EverQuote enhances the insurance shopping experience, enabling consumers to make informed decisions based on their individual needs and preferences. The company focuses on providing a user-friendly interface and comprehensive resources to educate consumers about insurance options, coverage, and costs. Additionally, EverQuote partners with various insurance companies to generate high-quality leads, thereby helping insurers reach potential customers efficiently. As the insurance industry continues to evolve, EverQuote remains committed to innovation, aiming to improve the way people shop for insurance and ensuring that consumers have access to the best possible options for their coverage needs.

seo.meta_title: EverQuote, Inc. | Your Online Insurance Marketplace
seo.meta_description: Explore EverQuote, Inc., a leading online insurance marketplace. Compare insurance quotes and discover a variety of coverage options tailored to your needs.

faq.question: What does EverQuote do?
faq.answer: EverQuote is an online marketplace that helps consumers compare insurance quotes from various providers.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of EverQuote?
faq.answer: Seth Birnbaum is the CEO of EverQuote, Inc.

faq.question: Where is EverQuote headquartered?
faq.answer: EverQuote is headquartered in Cambridge, Massachusetts, USA.

faq.question: What types of insurance can I compare on EverQuote?
faq.answer: You can compare auto, home, health, and life insurance on EverQuote.
